item.description:
In "The Girl Who Kicked the Hornets' Nest" -- the final installment of the "Millenium trilogy" -- Lisbeth Salander is fighting for her life in more ways than one. In intensive care and charged with three murders, she will not only have to prove her innocence, but also identify and denounce those corrupt government institutions that very nearly destroyed her life. Once upon a time, she was a victim. Now Salander is fighting back.

Directed by Daniel Alfredson
Rated R
148 Minutes

The show starts at 9:10. Let's meet at 8:30/8:45 to buy tickets and discuss plans for potential outing on Thayer after the movie.

General Admission is $9.50

If you haven't seen or read the past two titles of this series, I think you could still follow along. This is an action suspense film (my words not reviewers). View the trailer here http://www.avoncinema...
item.name: The Girl Who Kicked The Hornets Net
